summary: This is an email from an FBI victim specialist in the New York Field Office to Sigrid McCawley, inviting her to a victim briefing regarding the Epstein case. It indicates coordination between law enforcement and victims' representatives.

persons.name: Sigrid McCawley
persons.context: Recipient of an email from an FBI victim specialist regarding an invitation to an Epstein victim briefing.

connections.description: FBI victim specialist communicating with a legal representative regarding a victim briefing.

events.title: Email sent regarding victim briefing
events.description: An FBI victim specialist emails Sigrid McCawley to provide contact information and indicate that invites for a victim briefing will be sent out.

keyFacts: The FBI New York Field Office was organizing a briefing for Epstein victims as of September 2019.
Sigrid McCawley, an attorney or victim representative, was a point of contact for this coordination.
The communication shows ongoing victim outreach and support efforts by law enforcement following Epstein's arrest and death.
